11.content: How about some of the most well known male pokemon trainers in the series?
11.title: Male Trainers

111.content:
Ash loved food.

Since his childhood, he loved food. He was that little kid who held always a candy bar in his hand and had his cheeks puffed by the cookies he stole from the jar his mother put on the top of the oven and away from him. He always managed to get them by climbing on a chair and hid them in the corners of his bedroom. She scolded him when he was caught but he never stopped eating snacks and junk food. He had his little arms and legs covered with chub and a slight round jiggling belly. He was healthy but his parents weren't very happy about it, especially his mother.

Growing up, and with Mom's strict diet -which wasn't pleasing Ash at all- the boy started to lose his fat. He passed through the elementary school with a slimmer body yet a not so happy mood. Ash always complained but his parents had him under control, and had his weight under control. They made sure that their son wouldn't snack out of the house nor inside, and even if, they gave him only a small snack when he was finished from his homework. By the age of seven, Ash was a slim healthy boy.

In middle school, Ash was partially free. He sometimes snacked out of the house- not to say everyday, and it gotten to him quickly. His frame started to get chubby all over and again Mr. and Mrs. Ketchum weren't very happy. He was a healthy weight, but the two parents were looking for total perfection and weren't going to stick by something less than that.

"Mom!" yelled a thirteen years old Ash as his mother grabbed the bag of potato chips from his side. He was playing video games and he needed to snack.
"No Ash, you don't need this. You need to lose weight"

Ash gave a pout. He looked down at the slight bulge of his tummy and sucked in it slowly "N-no..."

"You can have it once you go to the soccer club we signed you in" Delia spoke up as she started to search inside Ash's drawers for any hidden snack and she found plenty.

Ash stood up "I don't like soccer!"

"We signed you in in other clubs. Pick up one"
"I don't like..." Ash made a face. He tossed away the game controller and walked over his bed, throwing himself into it "Ugh!"

It was like a the game of the cat and the mouse. When his parents aren't looking, Ash gains weight, when they notice, he drops it. His middle school years passed by like that, and Ash got plenty of comments on his body all the way. Especially from his friends Gary and Misty who were surely confused at the way their friend's body changed.

High school needed a great body. Ash knew that.

His freshman year wasn't the happiest because he wasn't exactly slim. He didn't get picked at but got fat jokes everyday. He wasn't safe from Misty and Gary either and they made fun of Ash's gut every time they got the chance to. It put the boy's self esteem down because he had only some chub here and there and everyone made jokes about his stomach.

Sure, his parents had always to put their fingers in the pie, and this time, Ash was cooperative. He started playing soccer outside school, and got pretty well at it. He was in the perfect shape to play with the school team and everyone watched in amazement the big changes. It was his chance to ask Misty out anyway, and he did. She accepted dating him and no person could pull them apart.

"You've... you've changed, Ash"
"Really?"
"Uhm"

Misty spoke in a soft tone, her body very close to Ash's. They were standing up by a tree and were about to head home.

"In a good way?" Ash smirked.

The redhead licked her lips as her hand reached for Ash's abdomen and stroked it. She looked hesitant, but finally nodded.

Until senior year, Ash's high school life was perfect; he had a great figure, with a ripped six pack and an important muscular mass, he was very popular among girls, he had his own cheer leading team, he was dating Misty, and was feeling very good about himself. Even when it came to food, he ate whatever he wanted because he worked out everyday at school, and that was a good thing,

Summer was here, and Ash wanted to get the max of fun before heading to college.

Maybe too much fun?
111.title: Prologue

12132.content:
One day at Cerulean City, Misty was going about her daily routine and business at the gym, some trainers had come in to have their go at gaining the Cerulean badge, all seem to going as usual but suddenly as Misty was walking back to the lounge room, she was surprised to feel a tug at the back of her shorts, looking around she saw Psyduck trying to get her attention.

"Psyduck? What's wrong?" Misty asked, Psyduck didn't respond with an answer instead clutching its head and moaning as usual. "Silly thing," Misty thought to herself. But for some reason there seemed to be something different about Psyduck's headache, the more Misty looked, the more she looked into Psyduck's eyes; before its eyes suddenly turned into swirls.

"Wow, look at all those bright colours..." thought Misty. Unknown to her, Psyduck was using a hypnosis by accident! The more she looked into the Pokémon’s eyes; the more she felt her mind slowly warping and distorting itself.

choices: A half ton pound Officer Jenny
125111.content:
It was a beutiful day in pallet town.

The sun was shining bright through the clouds, the pidgeys were chirping, and a light breeze wafted through the air.

But for a little boy banned ash Ketchum, today will turn out to be nothing if not pleasant.

Assure was in his room, laying on his bed daydreaming of getting his first Pokemon."I can't wait until Friday!" Ash thought eagerly"I'll finally get to go one my Pokemon journey, I've been waiting for it my whole life!" He continued" But what Pokemon should I get? Hmmmm, charmanders is fire type, so it definitely crush grass types, but grass types are good against water attacks so maybe bulbasaur." Ash couldn't decide, they all had their advantages, and their weaknesses, but he couldent figure out which one is the best.

I three days, Ash has his 11th Birthday, and he will finnally be old enough to go on a journey. Unfortunately, he will soon learn that the experience won't have the same appeal.

As Ash daydreamned, he saw himself defeating countless Pokemon trainers in an arena with thousands of people shouting" Go Ash Go!". However, Ash's daze was cut short by a violent knuking in the door. " THUD,THUD, THUD!!!". Ash jumped out of bed and onto the floor, jolted by the surprise."Ash?" Someone asked. "Ash, are you okay?" A head popped in through the doorway, revealing ash's mother, Delia.

"Yeah mom, I'm fine. Ughhh... Just a little bruise" ash said rubbing his head. " Don't worry about me, go awnser the door, I'll be out soon. Delia began to protest, but was cut off by the door knocking again" THUD,THUD,THUD!" " Coming!" Delia shouted through the house. Ash followed her to the door, though still in pain from the fall.

Delia opened the door to find...
125111.title: Ash's Unexpected Guest

1251111.content:
The Door opened to reveal the biggest women that ash had ever saw in his young life.

It was an officer Jenny, but not like the ones around Pallet Town. The Uniform that she wore, although probably Tripple extra large, did nothing to cover up her gargantuan belly, and actually was more of a bra. And what a belly it was, from Ash's perspective, it was roughly his size in height. Her breasts were as big as Voltobs, most likely a cup size H. Ash couldn't see it, but her butt was was even bigger and wider then her belly, which was half exposed because her shorts couldn't contain such a big trunk.

Ash lookedat Jenny in awe and fear. Pallet Towns residents were relatively healthy, the worst having a small belly. But this Officer Jenny was so obece, ash had a hard time believing that she was able to stand. He looked at his mother for a response, hoping she would do all the talking and not include him in the conversation.


Delia looked at Jenny with a face of...
1251111.title: Ash's first Fat women

12511111.content: Whatif Officer Jenny and Delia Ketchum were actually romantically involved
12511111.title: Delia's Love Interest

12511112.content:
Delia looked at Jenny with a friendly smile, making Ash calm down and sighing with relief believing there was nothing to worry about. "Hello Officer, what brings you here today?" Delia asked, not shocked by the woman's size and weight.

"Just doing my civic duty by checking for any trouble in town, there's been rumours that some rocket gang members have been spotted nearby," Jenny replied. As the two continued to talk back and forth about their conversation, Ash couldn't help but stare at Jenny's body, every time she spoke or made any sudden movements, he watched as her body just rippled and jiggled; it was quite hypnotising.

While focusing on Jenny's body, he was suddenly caught off guard when his mother and Officer Jenny had stopped talking, with Jenny looked back at Ash.

"Something wrong young man…?"
12511112.title: Friendly encounter

125111121.content:
"Uh no..." Ash sheepishly responded.

"Hmmm, well Mrs Ketchum since you've no info, I'll be off now, I've got to track down those criminals." Jenny said shifting her colossal frame, her flab jiggling.

Ash was enthralled by this walking mass of obesity and he needed to see more of her.

"Um wait, I think I've seen those criminals you're talking about." Ash lied.

"Gasp oh dear." Delia gasped

"Don't worry miss, I'm a skilled officer." Jenny comforted the concerned mother.

Jenny then wobbled over to the nervous yet ecstatic boy. "Now son tell me what you know, where did you see them." Jenny said leaning over Ash giving him a bird's eye view of her massive deep cleavage.

"Well uh.. I ..uh..I've just been seeing shady characters around town lately is all." Ash continued his deception.

"Hmmm sounds troublesome. Would you be willing to show me around town." Jenny asked.

"Oh but won't take be dangerous?" Delia nervously remarked.

"Don't worry maam, I'll be with him at all times." Jenny assured.

Ash silently rejoiced at the very thought of being near this gargantuous beauty.

"W-Well okay then, I suppose it is for the good of the town afterall." Delia said.

"You willing to accompany me young man?" Jenny again requested.

"Yes" Ash audibly answered.

"Excellent. I'll be taking your boy for a while maam but rest assured he's in good hands." Jenny promised.

Ash followed the obese officer out the door, watching her gelatinous buttocks jiggle with each step. Jenny heaved her obese body to a specially designed motorcycle, one capable of holding her girth. Jenny gasping for air, climbed on the bike.

"Gasp hop gasp on boy." Jenny said breathing heavily.

Ash eagerly got on sitting behind Jenny's soft ass.

"Now hold on tight young man." Jenny suggested.

"Oh okay." Ash enthusiastically answered wrapping his arms around Jenny's bulk, her flab rolling over his arms, securing him in her smothering fat.

"Good now where to?" Jenny asked.

Thinking of the best way to enjoy Jenny's obesity, Ash tried to think of an advantageous location "To the..."
125111121.title: Ash lies and says something

125111122.content:
Ash didn't know what to say. He was completely caught off guard by her question. When he tried to think of awnser for her, all he could think about was how her enormous pale belly jiggled with the slightest movement, or how her massive melons swayed left to right in a seducing manner. In the end, all ash could muster was a bright red blush on his cheeks.

Delia didn't notice it, but Jenny did. She instantly put the pieces together, how her fat body had captured the thoughts of this young boy. She gave him a hungry look befor she turned back to Delia.

"Anyway, what were you saying about staying for dinner?" Ash went wideeyed. He hadn't be listing at all to their conversation, and apparantly his mom, being the hospitable mother she is, had invited the blob police officer into their home. "Oh, yes! I was making dinner for the ash and me when I realized, again, I had cooked too much food. It would be so nice if you could join us." Delia replied. Jenny looked back at ash for a couple of seconds. "Sure, why not? It's been a slow day anyway."

"Oh good! Dinner will be ready in an hour. Please, come in." Delia said getting out of the way for her. Jenny's massive form walked into the house with surprising speed for her size, as if all that flab didnt hinder her movement at all. Every step she took the house shook just a little bit, floorboards creaking and light fixtures swaying. While walking through his home, ash got to see a good view of Jenny's backside, her butt coming dangerously close from snaking into the wall.

"Make yourself comfortable while I prepare dinner. Ash, make sure our the nice police officer gets whatever she wants, alright?" Delia didn't wait for an awnser and strolled off into the kitchen. Jenny took her words to heart. She walked over to the couch and planted her massive rear on it, breaking it instantley. Ash stood jaw dropped at how she had just destroyed his couch so casually, as if this was a common occurance. Making herself more comfortable, Jenny started to undress her uniform. Ash was feeling all sorts of emotions at that moment. If her outfit before assent revealing enough, ash clearly could see how fat she was now.

Stripped down her to her bra and panties, she looked over to ash

"Young man, do you think you could do something for me?"

Not being able to say no, ash gingerly walked up to her. "Could you please
125111122.title: Dinner Guest

1251111221.content:
"Could you please Sneak me some food?" Jenny asked. "I had a VERY light lunch, and I don't think I can wait an hour for dinner."

"B-but it's only an hour..." Ash stammered

"Uh-uh-uh" Jenny waged her finger at Ash "I believe your
mothers exact words were 'make sure our little police officer get whatever she wants', and what I want..." Jenny paused and slapped her belly for emphasis, making it wobble wildly, "is enough food to tide me over until Dinner."

Ash felt his legs go numb. The thought of feeding this...this gelatinous ball of blubber made him feel weird, not disgusted, but weird. "And-d-d-d" Ash stammered, "How much food w-w-will be enough?"

"Mmmmmmm...I'll tell you when enough is enough,now, run along little boy, Mama's hungry!" -
------------------------------------------------------------------

Apparently, 'enough', is never enough for Jenny.

For a little less then an hour, Ash had been carrying armfuls of food from the kitchen to feed Jenny, and after she ate, she would always say "Still not full~"

All the while, Jenny's body seemingly grew before Ash's eyes. It was if everything she ate was instantly digested into soft, wobbling blubber. Her bra creaked and groaned as it was struggling to cover up her ever growing boobs, and her panties were not doing so well either.

"BUUUUURRRRRP" Jenny Belched so loud that it cracked the Windows. "Ahhh...i think thats enough food for now." Ash let out a sigh of relief, but it did not last long, for the next words he heard sent shivers down his spine...

"DINNER!" Delia shouted from the kitchen.

"Oh thank god!" Jenny got up from the ruined couch. "Im practically starving!"

"What!" Ash exclaimed. "But you just ate enough food to feed a family reunion!" Unfortunately, ash's cries fell on deaf ears, as Jenny walked into the Kitchen, she momentarily got stuck in the doorway, but quickly got out by swaying her hips to the side to make it wider for her. "CRASH" "CRASH"

"Mmmmm it all smells so good Mrs. Ketchum!" Jenny said. The Dinner table was a smorgasbord of food. Turkey, ham, chicken, potatoes, pies, cakes, the list goes on and on. Delia seemned to have went all out for the Police Officers arrival, but Ash had a sneaking suspicion that even all this won't be enough for her.

"Would you like me to fetch a chair for you?" Delia asked, knowing that the ones already at the table won't stand up against her tush.

"No thank you; my 'giggle' behind is a rather comfy cushion for me" Officer Jenny said. She sat on the floor, yet even sitting dos she was tall enough for the table to be squashed under her Breasts. Without another word she started shoveling food into her face. Ash grabbed his portion quickly, knowing that he might mot get the chance to eat later.
--------------------------------------------/-/-------

And how right Ash was, because by the end of supper, Jenny had DEMOLISHED the feast in front of her...

1413.content:
Mew was resting on top of tree branch in a dence forest filled of Pokemon and devoid of humans. She yawned cutely and rolled over to her side, dreaming of placating around with other Pokemon and teasing trainers.

Life was good for Mew. She was happy, content, and didn't have worry about any responsibilities She just got to lie around all day and pull pranks on people.

For Mew, things are about to change real fast.

Little did the sleeping Pokemon know, Mewtwo was spying on her form from afar with mischievous intent. "Look at that Mew" Mewtwo grinned. "Shes always complaining how I should be more like him. Well, Mew like to play pranks, so I'm play a prank on her."

Mewtwo's eyes glowed bright as her brought up his paws in front of him. Soon, Mew Was bathed in a purple aura that was slowly changing her mind..

Mewtwo's eyes stopped glowing and Mew returned to her pink, normal self...with one small exception to her brain.

Mewtwo smirked and waited for Ames to wake up, wanting to watch his prank unfold before him.


Later...


'YAWNNN" Mew yawned and smacked her lips as she woke up from her nap. She stretched her little arms over her head and opened her eyes to greet the day.

Mew's little (for now) gut gurgled lightly, prompting Mew to get up and find some food. Mew started to float and flew away from her resting spot. Mewtwo spies on her from afar and followed mew, making sure she won't see him. "This is going to be fun" He chuckled to himself

1441.title: Charizards Pokerus

choices: Charizard try's to win Ash's love by putting on weight.0
14412.content:
Charizard watched Ash Train.

Every night, same time, same place, Charizard would hide behind a tree in the Oak Corral, watching her master train and work out. She would look forward to these moments, where Ash was sweaty and shirtless. Ever since she was a young Charmander, and was rescued and captured by Ash, she fell in love with the trainer. Every kind word, pat on the back or head, hug, kiss on the head or cheek, made her blush and heart rate to increase.

She was desperately in love with Ash. But it could never be, due to him being a human and she being a Pokémon. But still, that couldn't mean she couldn't fantasize, or dream of it too happen. Her dreams consisted of the two admitting their love for each, before kissing and hugging each other to the ground. That was the reason why she never listened to Ash before. Because disobedience was the only way to deal with her confusing emotions. But over time, she started to listen to Ash's commands in battle, and accepted that she was in love with Ash.

Her fantasies of herself on her haunches, hugging her trainer into her belly. She would nuzzle him and lick his head affectionately, while he wrapped his puny arms around her waist and snuggle up against his Pokemon.

Charizard was so caught up in her thoughts and fantasies, they she did not notice her sub conscious have her start moving closer, from hiding behind one tree, to one that was closer. She was shocked out her thoughts, as her foot accidentally snapped a twig.

Ash, upon hearing the snap, instantly stopped his pull ups on a trees branch, and looked towards the origin. What he saw, was a small part of a orange claw/foot on the ground, two medium to long sized white nails, and a large flame.

"Charizard? Is that you?" He asked, while letting go of the limp and falling onto his feet. Charizard gulped, and slowly, yet awkwardly walked out from behind the tree.

"Char..." She awnserd. Another thing that kept them from being together Charizard thought, Ash couldent understand her.

"Were you spying on me?" Ash asked.

Chairzard simply nodded glumly and sat on the ground, like a child awaiting punishment.

Ash sighed. Chairzard had been acting weird for the last week. Always looking at him funny, scaring off girls that approached him. He couldent piece it together, he always was oblivious to love. Ash walked over to chairzard and sat next to her, petting her scaly back. Chairzard let out a growl of affection.

"Look, I don't know what's going on between us, but if you ever wanna hang out with me, you don't usage to hide." Ash said, trying to comfort his Charizard.

Chairzard gave a small smile at ash. But then she noticed something on the ground, a magazine lying right next to Ash's feet. Curiously, she reached her hand over Ash and picked it up, much to his horror.

"GACK!! Uh Charizard, t-t-t-that's nothing it's just a piece of garbage I found on the side of the street and I picked it up, because you know I'm all about saving the planet!" Ash stuttered out, grooming nervously as Charizard squinted at the tabloid.

Chairzard wdened her eyes as she realized what she was looking at. There was a picture of an incredibly I race lucario on the front of the cover, rubbing its belly with one paw, and eating food with the other. At the top of the cover it read, "POKE'FAT, Fat Pokemon are Best Pokemon!"

"Hey Charizard there's something behind you!" Ash shouted

"Zard?" Chairzard looked behind her, but much to her confusion there was nothing there. When she turned back around, the magazine was no longer in her claw.

"Sorry Charizard!" Ash shouted behind his back as he ran off into the distance, leaving an orange dragon dazed and confused by what just happened.

"Why would ash carry something like that?" Chairzard thought to herself. Of coarse, in human language it came out as "Charizard?".

Suddenly, it dawned on her. Ash always acted different around bigger Pokemon. Sure he lived all his Pikemon very much, but she wasent Unknown to the states that he gives Snorlax while eating.

Ash liked fat Pokemon.
14412.title: AshXCharizard
